com.bignerdranch.android.geoquiz

Class BooleanQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bignerdranch.android.geoquiz.BooleanQuestion

  • public class BooleanQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a single question with a boolean answer (true or false).
    Author:
    Bill Phillips, Brian Hardy, AJ Parmidge

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BooleanQuestion(int question, boolean answer)
      Creates a new boolean (True/False) question.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getQuestion()
      Returns the text of this boolean question.
      boolean isTrueQuestion()
      Returns whether or not the answer to this question is true.
      protected void setAnswer(boolean answer)
      Sets whether the answer to this question is true or false.
      protected void setQuestion(int question)
      Sets the text of this boolean question to the string resource with the given value.
